column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The food and sangria here were delicious!! Our waitress was also great. One of the waiters accidentally took one of our dishes to another table
column2: causing us to have to wait a while for a new one
column3: but the manager came over and was very apologetic and nice about it
column4: and even took it off our bill. I will definitely be going back for more tapas!
